info.title: CSRS API
info.description: BC Child Support Recalculation Service API

get.summary: Gets the valid gender values for an account.
Gets the valid province values for an account.
Gets the valid identity values for an account.
Gets the valid referral values for an account.
Gets the preferred contact methods values for an account.
Gets the current user's file summary.

200.description: The user and their files were found.

401.description: The request is not authorized. Ensure correct authentication header is present.

200.description: The user and file were created.

400.description: The request was not well formed.

401.description: The request is not authorized. Ensure correct authentication header is present.

409.description: There is already a draft file associated with the current user/account.

404.description: The csrs account was not found

401.description: The request is not authorized. Ensure correct authentication header is present.

400.description: The request was not well formed.

401.description: The request is not authorized. Ensure correct authentication header is present.

get.summary: Get the file details list in folder associated to the application folder and document type

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The file id for the file trying to access

200.description: The file id and password were correct.

400.description: Either the file id or password were not supplied, empty or whitespace.

404.description: The respondent file with matching file id and password was not found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully.

get.summary: Gets the valid court level values.
Gets the valid court locations values.

id.description: The unique id of the value.

fileNumber.description: The input FileNumber parameter to search CSRS account.

referenceNumber.description: The input Password parameter to search CSRS account.

partyId.description: The output Party Id of CSRS account.

fileId.description: The output File Id of CSRS account.
The internal id of the file.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
